comments.raw_text:
Note: these XPCShell tests come from bug 625160 patch 8/8.

They are using fake vendor IDs such as 0xabcd.

Today's failures were caused by my changeset whitelisting only intel/ati/nvidia: as a result, vendor '0xabcd' got blocked.

The workaround I landed consists in whitelisting the fake vendor ids used by the tests. This is harmless at it doesn't collide with real vendor ids anyway.
comments.author: jacob.benoit.1@gmail.com
